title: Minister Lamamra discusses with his Malian counterpart
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Ramtane Lamamra, held talks with his Malian counterpart, Abdoulaye Diop, as well as with the Minister of National Reconciliation, in charge of the Peace and Reconciliation Agreement, Colonel Ismaël Wagué.

The discussions between the two parties focused on bilateral relations and the means of their development, in addition to the prospects for revitalizing and strengthening the pace of implementation of the Peace and Reconciliation Agreement in collaboration with all Malian parties within the framework of the mechanisms for monitoring the implementation of the Agreement supervised by Algeria.

As a reminder, the two Malian ministers arrived Sunday evening in Algiers as part of a working visit as special envoys of the Malian President of the transition, Assimi Goïta, and this, following the visit recently made by Mr. Lamamra in Bamako as Special Envoy of the President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune, which is part of the regular consultations between the two brotherly countries.
